ED_Title: Election of the President of the General Assembly at its seventy-sixth session
ED_DecisionText: At its 72nd plenary meeting, on 7 June 2021, the General Assembly, in accordance with Article 21 of the Charter of the United Nations, rule 30 of the rules of procedure of the Assembly and paragraph 1 of the annex to resolution 33/138 of 19 December 1978, elected Abdulla Shahid of Maldives as President of the General Assembly at its seventy-sixth session.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
